00028 // Note To Mods //
00029 /*
00030 Please do not change anything here and release it..
00031 There is going to be a new forum created just for the Kademlia side of the client..
00032 If you feel there is an error or a way to improve something, please
00033 post it in the forum first and let us look at it.. If it is a real improvement,
00034 it will be added to the offical client.. Changing something without knowing
00035 what all it does can cause great harm to the network if released in mass form..
00036 Any mod that changes anything within the Kademlia side will not be allowed to advertise
00037 there client on the eMule forum..
00038 */

00040 #ifndef __UINT128_H__
00041 #define __UINT128_H__
00042 
00043 #include "../../Types.h"
00044 
00046 namespace Kademlia {
00048 
00049 class CUInt128
00050 {
00051 public:
00052     CUInt128(const CUInt128& value) throw()
00053     {
00054         SetValue(value);
00055     }
00056 
00057     explicit CUInt128(bool fill = false) throw()
00058     {
00059         m_data[0] = m_data[1] = m_data[2] = m_data[3] = (fill ? (uint32_t)-1 : 0);
00060     }
00061 
00062     explicit CUInt128(uint32_t value) throw()
00063     {
00064         SetValue(value);
00065     }
00066 
00067     explicit CUInt128(const uint8_t *valueBE) throw()
00068     {
00069         SetValueBE(valueBE);
00070     }
00071 
00076     CUInt128(const CUInt128& value, uint32_t numBits);
00077 
00079     unsigned GetBitNumber(unsigned bit) const throw()
00080     {
00081         return bit <= 127 ? (m_data[bit / 32] >> (31 - (bit % 32))) & 1 : 0;
00082     }
00083 
00084     int CompareTo(const CUInt128& other) const throw();
00085     int CompareTo(uint32_t value) const throw();
00086 
00087     wxString ToHexString() const;
00088     wxString ToBinaryString(bool trim = false) const;
00089     void ToByteArray(uint8_t *b) const;
00090 
00091     uint32_t Get32BitChunk(unsigned val) const throw()
00092     {
00093         return val < 4 ? m_data[val] : 0;
00094     }
00095 
00096     void Set32BitChunk(unsigned chunk, uint32_t value)
00097     {
00098         wxCHECK2(chunk < 4, return);
00099 
00100         m_data[chunk] = value;
00101     }
00102 
00103     CUInt128& SetValue(const CUInt128& value) throw()
00104     {
00105         m_data[0] = value.m_data[0];
00106         m_data[1] = value.m_data[1];
00107         m_data[2] = value.m_data[2];
00108         m_data[3] = value.m_data[3];
00109         return *this;
00110     }
00111 
00112     CUInt128& SetValue(uint32_t value) throw()
00113     {
00114         m_data[0] = m_data[1] = m_data[2] = 0;
00115         m_data[3] = value;
00116         return *this;
00117     }
00118 
00119     CUInt128& SetValueBE(const uint8_t *valueBE) throw();
00120 
00130     void StoreCryptValue(uint8_t *buf) const;
00131 
00133     CUInt128& SetBitNumber(unsigned bit, unsigned value)
00134     {
00135         wxCHECK(bit <= 127, *this);
00136 
00137         if (value)
00138             m_data[bit / 32] |= 1 << (31 - (bit % 32));
00139         else
00140             m_data[bit / 32] &= ~(1 << (31 - (bit % 32)));
00141 
00142         return *this;
00143     }
00144 
00145     CUInt128& ShiftLeft(unsigned bits) throw();
00146 
00147     CUInt128& Add(const CUInt128& value) throw();
00148     CUInt128& Add(uint32_t value) throw()
00149     {
00150         return value ? Add(CUInt128(value)) : *this;
00151     }
00152 
00153     CUInt128& Subtract(const CUInt128& value) throw();
00154     CUInt128& Subtract(uint32_t value) throw()
00155     {
00156         return value ? Subtract(CUInt128(value)) : *this;
00157     }
00158 
00159     CUInt128& XOR(const CUInt128& value) throw()
00160     {
00161         m_data[0] ^= value.m_data[0];
00162         m_data[1] ^= value.m_data[1];
00163         m_data[2] ^= value.m_data[2];
00164         m_data[3] ^= value.m_data[3];
00165         return *this;
00166     }
00167 
00168     CUInt128& XORBE(const uint8_t *valueBE) throw() { return XOR(CUInt128(valueBE)); }
00169 
00170     bool operator<  (const CUInt128& value) const throw() {return (CompareTo(value) <  0);}
00171     bool operator>  (const CUInt128& value) const throw() {return (CompareTo(value) >  0);}
00172     bool operator<= (const CUInt128& value) const throw() {return (CompareTo(value) <= 0);}
00173     bool operator>= (const CUInt128& value) const throw() {return (CompareTo(value) >= 0);}
00174     bool operator== (const CUInt128& value) const throw() {return (CompareTo(value) == 0);}
00175     bool operator!= (const CUInt128& value) const throw() {return (CompareTo(value) != 0);}
00176 
00177     CUInt128& operator= (const CUInt128& value) throw() { return SetValue(value); }
00178     CUInt128& operator+=(const CUInt128& value) throw() { return Add(value); }
00179     CUInt128& operator-=(const CUInt128& value) throw() { return Subtract(value); }
00180     CUInt128& operator^=(const CUInt128& value) throw() { return XOR(value); }
00181     CUInt128  operator+ (const CUInt128& value) const throw() { return CUInt128(*this).Add(value); }
00182     CUInt128  operator- (const CUInt128& value) const throw() { return CUInt128(*this).Subtract(value); }
00183     CUInt128  operator^ (const CUInt128& value) const throw() { return CUInt128(*this).XOR(value); }
00184 
00185     bool operator<  (uint32_t value) const throw() {return (CompareTo(value) <  0);}
00186     bool operator>  (uint32_t value) const throw() {return (CompareTo(value) >  0);}
00187     bool operator<= (uint32_t value) const throw() {return (CompareTo(value) <= 0);}
00188     bool operator>= (uint32_t value) const throw() {return (CompareTo(value) >= 0);}
00189     bool operator== (uint32_t value) const throw() {return (CompareTo(value) == 0);}
00190     bool operator!= (uint32_t value) const throw() {return (CompareTo(value) != 0);}
00191 
00192     CUInt128& operator= (uint32_t value) throw() { return SetValue(value); }
00193     CUInt128& operator+=(uint32_t value) throw() { return Add(value); }
00194     CUInt128& operator-=(uint32_t value) throw() { return Subtract(value); }
00195     CUInt128& operator^=(uint32_t value) throw() { return value ? XOR(CUInt128(value)) : *this; }
00196     CUInt128  operator+ (uint32_t value) const throw() { return CUInt128(*this).Add(value); }
00197     CUInt128  operator- (uint32_t value) const throw() { return CUInt128(*this).Subtract(value); }
00198     CUInt128  operator^ (uint32_t value) const throw() { return value ? CUInt128(*this).XOR(CUInt128(value)) : *this; }
00199 
00200     CUInt128  operator<< (uint32_t bits) const throw() { return CUInt128(*this).ShiftLeft(bits); }
00201     CUInt128& operator<<=(uint32_t bits) throw() { return ShiftLeft(bits); }
00202 
00203 private:
00204     bool IsZero() const throw()
00205     {
00206         return (m_data[0] | m_data[1] | m_data[2] | m_data[3]) == 0;
00207     }
00208 
00209     uint32_t m_data[4];
00210 };
00211 
00212 inline bool operator==(uint32_t x, const CUInt128& y) throw() { return y.operator==(x); }
00213 inline bool operator!=(uint32_t x, const CUInt128& y) throw() { return y.operator!=(x); }
00214 inline bool operator<(uint32_t x, const CUInt128& y) throw() { return y.operator>(x); }
00215 inline bool operator>(uint32_t x, const CUInt128& y) throw() { return y.operator<(x); }
00216 inline bool operator<=(uint32_t x, const CUInt128& y) throw() { return y.operator>=(x); }
00217 inline bool operator>=(uint32_t x, const CUInt128& y) throw() { return y.operator<=(x); }
00218 inline CUInt128 operator+(uint32_t x, const CUInt128& y) throw() { return y.operator+(x); }
00219 inline CUInt128 operator-(uint32_t x, const CUInt128& y) throw() { return CUInt128(x).Subtract(y); }
00220 inline CUInt128 operator^(uint32_t x, const CUInt128& y) throw() { return y.operator^(x); }
00221 
00222 } // End namespace
00223 
00224 #endif
